summary: AN ORDINANCE amending the Seattle Comprehensive Plan to incorporate portions of the Eastlake Neighborhood Plan; amending the Official Land Use Map, SMC 23.32.016, to show the boundaries of the Eastlake Residential Urban Village, and amending SMC Chapter 23.34, relating to Lowrise 3 and Lowrise 4 rezone criteria.
committee: Neighborhoods, Growth Planning and Civic Engagement
